text.div:
ConditionIdSearchParameter

Parameter _id:token

Searches for condition based on service Uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?_id={uuid}

ResourceCondition
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesCondition
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: ConditionIdSearchParameter
description: Searches for condition based on service Uuid eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?_id={uuid}
